attributes.action: Pay ALL ex service men their civil service pension
attributes.additional_details:
There are thousands of men and women who served their country from the age of 15 upwards that do not receive any pension for their service to God, Queen and country.
These service personal were willing to give their lives for us, so out of respect and decency the Government should pay them their pension as they pay every civil servant for their time given to their country.
